body_html: @krautt In case it's useful: there's a good chance that everything you want is still there, just possibly in a different namespace. There was a bunch of code movement right before 1.0, since after 1.0 we've promised not to move things for quite a while (unless it's in tf.contrib).
body_text: @krautt In case it's useful: there's a good chance that everything you want is still there, just possibly in a different namespace.  There was a bunch of code movement right before 1.0, since after 1.0 we've promised not to move things for quite a while (unless it's in tf.contrib).
body: @krautt In case it's useful: there's a good chance that everything you want is still there, just possibly in a different namespace.  There was a bunch of code movement right before 1.0, since after 1.0 we've promised not to move things for quite a while (unless it's in `tf.contrib`).
